urbit@urbit.org

zaptis

!=, zaptis, [%zpts p=twig] is a natural hoon that produces the formula of twig p as a noun.

Definition

++  twig  
  $%  [%zpts p=twig]
  ==

Regular form (tall)

!=  p

Regular form (wide)

!=(p)

Compilation

++  mint
  ?-  gen
    [%zpts *]  [(nice %noun) [%1 q:$(vet |, gen p.gen)]]
  ==

Notes

Arguably should be changed to use a type, like %zpsm and %zpcm.
